impart.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to give a particular quality to something
impart.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Use a piece of fresh ginger to impart a Far Eastern flavour to simple ingredients.
impart.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to give information, knowledge, wisdom etc to someone
impart.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: She had information that she couldnâ€™t wait to impart.
